system.description: Upper body of a human with the body of a horse from the waist down. Centaurs are nomadic, energetic, and adventurous. They tend to prefer taking action over waiting for long discussions.

overview.base:
Can wield @Property[Two-Handed]{two-handed} weapons in one hand.
Note: @Property[AP]{AP} weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be @Property[AV0]{AV0}.
